mapper.insert: insert into f_user (login_id, login_pw, name, email, tel_number, birth) values( #{loginId}, #{loginPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{telNumber}, #{birth} )
mapper.select: select login_id, login_pw, name, email, tel_number, birth, authority from f_user where login_Id = #{loginId} and authority = authority
mapper.delete: delete from f_user where login_Pw = #{loginPw} and login_Id = #{loginId}
